name: 吳景龍
objective:
本課程以英文商業溝通為教材，訓練學生商用英文字彙，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解商務英文，進而增進日後學生在商業職場上的語文應用。教材將選自報紙 / 雜誌（如 China Post 與 Taipei Times）或線上（如 VOA Special English）中適合學生之各類商業文章，以有效提升其商業英文閱聽及溝通能力。  

English Description: 
This course aims to use latest and current business stories as teaching materials to help students build their vocabulary, familiarize themselves with  sentence patterns and eventually develop their comprehension abilities. Business reports suitable for students will be selected from newspapers or news magazines (e.g. bilingual news from China Post and Taipei Times) and online news websites (e.g. VOA Special English) to effectively enhance students’ fundamental reading and communicative skills.

scorePolicy:
Percentile of Fnal Grades (成績配分):
1. Midterm Exam: 20%
2. Group Presentation in the Class or Final Exam:  20 %
3. Attendance, Individual Tasks (Homework, Solo Presentation, or Report), and Participation in the Classroom Discussions: 40 % (Note: Five Absences Leading to Failure) 
4. English Proficiency Test: 20%
